Header: Sangakkara to serve as MCC President from October 2019
Content: Former Sri Lanka captain Kumar Sangakkara, will be the next President of the Marleybone Cricket Club. He will be the first non-British president of the club.Sangakkara was given an honorary life membership of the club in 2012 and is also part of the MCCâ€™s World Cricket Committee. His tenure will run from October 2019 to September, 2020.Sangakkara said that it was a huge honour to be named the next President of MCC and it is a role that he is thoroughly looking forward to.
